name: Mind Cross Demo
description:
Join Rez and Psi as they get kidnapped by a mysterious figure. Trapped in a big blue box, they have no choice but to talk to each other to find a way out! You are now entering the world of "Psychological Buddy-Comedy."

Mind Cross is a #NaNoReNo19 project that rekindled by excitement in making visual novels with Ren'Py. I quickly found my original idea unfeasible due to starting with only 12 days left in the challenge, but as I worked on it I didn't want to rush or simplify the concept. So I made this demo which acts as a sort of "proof of concept" for a larger work to come.

Please comment whatever you thought below!
